## Erc721Enumerable.all() method

Get Owned NFTs

## Example

```javascript
// Address of the wallet to get the NFTs of
const address = "{{wallet_address}}";
const nfts = await contract.nft.query.owned.all(address);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
all(walletAddress?: string): Promise<NFT[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                     |
| ------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| walletAddress | string | <i>(Optional)</i> the wallet address to query, defaults to the connected wallet |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFT](./sdk.nft.md)\[\]&gt;

The NFT metadata for all NFTs in the contract.

## Remarks

Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.
